    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String strN,
              int intWinC,
              int intLoseC,
              int intTieC,
              int intWinR,
              int intLoseR,
              int intTieR,
              int intHS)
        Parameters:
        strN - is the name of the player
        intWinC - is the number of wins the player has in the classic game mode
        intLoseC - is the number of losses the player has in the classic game mode
        intTieC - is the number of ties the player has in the solo game mode
        intWinR - is the number of wins the player has in the reverse game mode
        intLoseR - is the number of losses the player has in the reverse game mode
        intTieR - is the number of ties the player has in the solo game mode
        intHS - is the highest score that the player has in the solo game mode

    • Method Detail

      • GetName

        public java.lang.String GetName()
        Returns:
        the name of the player

      • GetCStats

        public java.lang.Integer GetCStats()
        Returns:
        the overall percentage of games that the player has won in the classic game mode

      • GetRStats

        public java.lang.Integer GetRStats()
        Returns:
        the overall percentage of games that the player has won in the reverse game mode

      • UpdateHS

        public boolean UpdateHS(int intScore)
        Parameters:
        intScore - is the score that the player has just received in the solo game mode
        Returns:
        whether or not a change to the high score was made
